fields.description: The studio name shown in the header, footer, and browser tab.
fields.name: siteName

fields.description: Shown below the name in the footer, e.g. "Pole & Exotic Dance Studio".
fields.name: tagline

fields.description: An optional italic line, e.g. "Move to Express".
fields.name: motto

fields.description: The C4 Flow logo. Used in the header, footer, and hero section. PNG with transparent background works best.
fields.name: logo

fields.description: Small icon shown in the browser tab. Square image, ideally 512 x 512 px.
fields.name: favicon

fields.description: Shown in the footer and used for the contact form.
fields.name: contactEmail

fields.description: Include country code, e.g. "+27 65 391 7901".
fields.name: phone
fields.title: Phone Number

fields.description: International format WITHOUT the + sign, e.g. "27653917901". This powers the green WhatsApp button on every page.
fields.name: whatsappNumber
fields.title: WhatsApp Number

fields.description: Pre-filled message when someone clicks the WhatsApp button. Leave empty for no pre-filled text.
fields.name: whatsappMessage
fields.title: WhatsApp Default Message

fields.description: Full URL to the studio Instagram profile.
fields.name: instagramUrl
fields.title: Instagram (Studio)

fields.description: Full URL to the instructor's personal Instagram.
fields.name: instructorInstagramUrl
fields.title: Instagram (Instructor)

fields.description: The main Setmore booking link. Used for the "Book Now" button in the navigation.
fields.name: bookingUrl
fields.title: Booking Platform URL

fields.description: The physical address shown in the footer and on the contact page.
fields.name: address
fields.title: Studio Address

fields.description: Go to Google Maps, find the studio, click "Share" ‚Üí "Copy link" and paste it here.
fields.name: mapsUrl
fields.title: Google Maps Link

fields.description: This image appears when someone shares a page on Facebook, WhatsApp, or Twitter. Recommended size: 1200 x 630 pixels.
fields.name: defaultOgImage
fields.title: Default Social Share Image

description: The coloured banner shown at the very top of every page. Use it for promotions, new class announcements, or important notices. You can also attach a discount that automatically reduces class prices while the banner is live.

fields.description: Turn this ON to show the banner on every page. Turn it OFF to hide the banner AND remove any active discount from class prices.
fields.name: enabled
fields.title: Show Banner

validation.message: Keep under 120 characters so it fits on mobile.

fields.description: Keep it short ‚Äî one sentence. Example: "SALE! 25% OFF all group classes until end of March 2026"
fields.name: text
fields.title: Banner Text

fields.description: If set, visitors can click the banner to go to this page (e.g. the booking link).
fields.name: link
fields.title: Link URL (optional)

fields.description: When ON, class prices on the website are automatically reduced by the percentage below. Only works while the banner is also enabled.
fields.name: discountEnabled
fields.title: Enable Price Discount

fields.description: The percentage to reduce prices by. Enter 25 for "25% off". Prices are rounded down to the nearest Rand.
fields.name: discountPercent
fields.title: Discount Percentage

fields.description: Choose whether the discount applies to all classes or just specific ones.
fields.name: discountScope
fields.title: Apply Discount To

fields.description: Pick which classes get the discount. Leave empty if applying to all.
fields.name: discountClasses
fields.title: Discounted Classes

fields.description: When ON, this promotion also appears as a notice card above the weekly schedule ‚Äî giving it more visibility with room for extra detail.
fields.name: showInSchedule
fields.title: Also Show in Weekly Schedule

fields.description: A longer version of the banner message shown in the schedule section. Example: "Bring your partner or galentine and enjoy discounted rates all weekend."
fields.name: scheduleText
fields.title: Schedule Notice Text

name: announcementBar

fields.description: Internal name for this page (also used as a fallback for the browser tab title).
fields.name: title
fields.title: Page Title

fields.description: The page URL path. "home" = homepage, "about" = /about, "classes" = /classes, etc. Click "Generate" to auto-create from the title.
fields.name: slug
fields.title: URL Slug

fields.description: Build your page by adding sections below. Click "+ Add item" and choose a section type (Hero, Classes, Gallery, etc.). Drag to reorder.
fields.name: sections
fields.title: Page Sections

validation.message: Keep under 60 characters for best SEO
Keep under 160 characters for best SEO

fields.description: Image shown when shared on social media (1200x630 recommended)
fields.name: ogImage
fields.title: Open Graph Image

fields.description: The instructor's display name.
fields.name: name

fields.description: Shown below the name, e.g. "Pole dance instructor".
fields.name: title
fields.title: Job Title

fields.description: A short line, e.g. "4 years experience".
fields.name: experience

fields.description: A portrait photo. Vertical/portrait orientation works best (3:4 ratio). Use the hotspot tool to set the focal point.
fields.name: photo

fields.description: A 1‚Äì2 sentence summary shown when there's no full bio. Keep it personal and welcoming.
fields.name: shortBio

fields.description: A longer biography with rich text formatting. Shown on the About page.
A valid web, email, phone, or relative link.
fields.name: href
fields.title: Link

fields.name: bio
fields.title: Full Bio

fields.description: Full link to the instructor's Instagram profile.
fields.name: instagramUrl
fields.title: Instagram Profile URL

fields.description: Personal Setmore booking link. Powers the "Book a Session" button.
fields.name: bookingUrl
fields.title: Booking Link

fields.description: Only active classes are shown on the website. Turn off to hide a class without deleting it.
fields.name: active

fields.description: The name shown on the website, e.g. "Group Pole Class".
fields.name: name
fields.title: Class Name

fields.description: Auto-generated from the name. Click Generate to create it.
fields.name: slug
fields.title: URL Slug

fields.description: A photo representing this class. Landscape orientation works best (4:3 ratio).
fields.name: image
fields.title: Class Image

validation.message: Keep under 200 characters for clean card layout.

fields.description: A brief summary shown on class cards (1‚Äì2 sentences).
fields.name: shortDescription

fields.description: Detailed description shown on the class detail page.
A valid web, email, phone, or relative link.
fields.name: href
fields.title: Link

fields.name: description
fields.title: Full Description

fields.description: Controls the order classes appear on the website. Lower numbers show first (e.g. 1 = first, 2 = second).
fields.name: order
fields.title: Display Order

fields.description: The normal price in Rands. Just enter the number, e.g. "350".
fields.name: price
fields.title: Regular Price (ZAR)

fields.description: Optional ‚Äî set a sale price to show a discount on the website. The regular price will appear crossed out. Clear this field to end the sale.
fields.name: salePrice
fields.title: Sale Price (ZAR)

fields.description: How long the class runs, e.g. 60 for a 1-hour class.
fields.name: duration
fields.title: Duration (minutes)

fields.description: The Setmore link for this specific class. If left empty, the "Book Now" button links to the main Setmore booking page instead.
fields.name: bookingUrl
fields.title: Booking Link

description: Messages sent via the contact form on the website. These are read-only ‚Äî you can mark them as read but cannot edit the content.

fields.description: Check this box once you've responded to the message.
fields.name: read
fields.title: Mark as Read

name: contactSubmission

fields.description: Add a row for every class on the weekly schedule. Click "+ Add item", choose the day, time, and class. Drag rows to reorder.
Which day of the week?
fields.name: day

fields.description: Pick a time slot or type your own.
fields.name: time

fields.description: Which class runs at this time?
fields.name: danceClass
fields.title: Class

fields.name: slots
fields.title: Time Slots

fields.description: Temporary announcements shown above the schedule ‚Äî holiday hours, specials, closures, etc. Toggle each notice on/off, or set start and end dates so they appear automatically. Click "+ Add item" to create one.
Turn this on to show the notice on the website. If you also set dates below, it must be active AND within the date range to appear.
fields.name: active

fields.description: Pick a look that matches the mood of the notice.
fields.name: style

fields.description: An emoji shown before the title, e.g. "üéÑ" or "üíï". Leave empty for the default style emoji.
fields.name: emoji
fields.title: Emoji (optional)

fields.description: Short headline, e.g. "Valentine's Special" or "Holiday Hours".
fields.name: title

fields.description: Extra info, e.g. "All classes 20% off this weekend!" or "Studio closed Dec 25‚Äì26, reopening Dec 27."
fields.name: body
fields.title: Details (optional)

fields.description: Add a link to make a button appear ‚Äî e.g. a booking page or event details.
fields.name: linkUrl
fields.title: Button Link (optional)

fields.description: The text on the button, e.g. "Book Now" or "Learn More". Only shown if a link is set.
fields.name: linkLabel
fields.title: Button Text

fields.description: If set, the notice only appears from this date onward. Leave empty to show immediately.
fields.name: startDate
fields.title: Show From (optional)

fields.description: If set, the notice hides after this date. Leave empty to show indefinitely (until you turn it off).
fields.name: endDate
fields.title: Show Until (optional)

fields.name: notices
fields.title: Schedule Notices

fields.description: The testimonial text. This is the only required field.
fields.name: quote

fields.description: The person's name, e.g. "Sarah M." ‚Äî leave blank for an anonymous testimonial.
fields.name: name
fields.title: Name (optional)

fields.description: E.g. "Pole Student", "Exotic Baddies regular", or "3-month member".
fields.name: role
fields.title: Role / Class (optional)

fields.description: A headshot or profile photo. Works great without one too ‚Äî a colourful placeholder will be shown instead.
fields.name: photo
fields.title: Photo (optional)

fields.description: 1‚Äì5 stars. Leave empty to hide stars.
fields.name: rating
fields.title: Star Rating (optional)

fields.description: Controls the order in the carousel. Lower numbers appear first.
fields.name: order
fields.title: Display Order

list.title: Split ‚Äî Text Left, Image Right (Classes/Contact style)
Gradient ‚Äî Centered Text, No Image (About/Mission style)

fields.description: Choose how the hero looks on the page.
fields.name: layout
fields.title: Layout Style

fields.description: The big heading text.
fields.name: headline

fields.description: A short line below the headline.
fields.name: subtitle

fields.description: Optional italic text, e.g. a motto like "Move to Express".
fields.name: tagline

fields.description: Optional paragraph shown below the headline. Useful for the "Split" and "Gradient" layouts.
fields.name: body
fields.title: Body Text

fields.description: Used as the full background in "Centered" layout, or as the right-side image in "Split" layout. Not used in "Gradient" layout.
fields.name: backgroundImage
fields.title: Background / Side Image

fields.description: Optional logo shown in the hero. Only appears in the "Centered" layout.
fields.name: overlayLogo

fields.description: Optional call-to-action button, e.g. "Book a Class".
fields.name: ctaText
fields.title: Button Text

fields.description: Where the button goes when clicked.
fields.name: ctaUrl
fields.title: Button Link

list.title: Minimal ‚Äî icons & text, no card backgrounds
Cards ‚Äî gradient backgrounds with decorative blobs

fields.description: Optional short text shown below the heading.
fields.name: subtitle

fields.description: Click "+ Add item" to add a feature card. Drag to reorder. The grid adjusts automatically based on how many cards you add (up to 6).
fields.name: features

fields.description: Show "Clicking Book Now will redirect..." note
fields.name: showBookingNote

fields.description: A valid web, email, phone, or relative link.
fields.name: href
fields.title: Link

fields.initialValue: Thank you! Your message has been sent.
fields.name: successMessage

fields.description: e.g. parking instructions
fields.name: additionalInfo
